name: Ralph's Myth
description:
Chapter One currently released

Chapter Two - IN PRODUCTION

Story

A young man by the name of Ralph lives in the small town of Fesfel, named after Ralph's father. Ralph's mother is sick and he has been caring for her along with his sister Elle.

Denira, Ralph's best friend and local healer, has promised that today she would visit Ralph's mother and help her get better with a special potion. But Denira hasn't shown up, so it's Ralph's duty to go and get her before it's dark.

This is the start of chapter one of Ralph's Myth.

Mechanics
  • A simple to grasp, yet deep combat system
  • Skills that level up through use
  • Weapons that get stronger the more you use them
  • Augments for your weapons and armors to make them powerful
  • A limited number of skills that you can bring into battle
Features
  • Fishing and Mining
  • Item Crafting, Alchemy, Armor Forging, and Cooking
  • Well written Quests and Side Quests
  • Unique and interesting characters
  • A well realized world and setting
